00037     struct _OgrePrivate GLSurfaceDesc
00038     {
00039     public:
00040         GLHardwarePixelBuffer *buffer;
00041         size_t zoffset;
00042         uint numSamples;
00043 
00044         GLSurfaceDesc() :buffer(0), zoffset(0), numSamples(0) {}
00045     };

00049     class _OgreGLExport GLRenderTexture: public RenderTexture
00050     {
00051     public:
00052         GLRenderTexture(const String &name, const GLSurfaceDesc &target, bool writeGamma, uint fsaa);
00053         virtual ~GLRenderTexture();
00054         
00055         bool requiresTextureFlipping() const { return true; }
00056

00059         static const String CustomAttributeString_GLCONTEXT;
00060     };
00061     
00064     class _OgreGLExport GLRTTManager: public Singleton<GLRTTManager>
00065     {
00066     public:
00067         virtual ~GLRTTManager();
00068         
00071         virtual RenderTexture *createRenderTexture(const String &name, const GLSurfaceDesc &target, bool writeGamma, uint fsaa) = 0;
00072         
00075         virtual bool checkFormat(PixelFormat format) = 0;
00076         
00079         virtual void bind(RenderTarget *target) = 0;
00080         
00085         virtual void unbind(RenderTarget *target) = 0;
00086 
00087         virtual void getBestDepthStencil(GLenum internalFormat, GLenum *depthFormat, GLenum *stencilFormat)
00088         {
00089             *depthFormat = GL_NONE;
00090             *stencilFormat = GL_NONE;
00091         }
00092 
00095         virtual MultiRenderTarget* createMultiRenderTarget(const String & name);
00096         
00099         virtual PixelFormat getSupportedAlternative(PixelFormat format);
00100     };
